name: CaptchaGate
author: keough99, Dabblecraft Dev Team
description: A CAPTCHA system to verify new members with configurable image challenges, roles, and kick limits.
install_msg: Thanks for installing CaptchaGate! Use [p]captchaset to begin configuration.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores Discord User IDs, Channel IDs, and Role IDs for configuration and in-memory tracking of active CAPTCHA attempts. This data is not shared.
